description: A fleet of large, disc-shaped spacecraft fills the night sky above a suburban house. Inside, a woman in a red bathrobe speaks on the telephone, agitatedly complaining about her television reception. Despite the overwhelming presence of the unidentified flying objects looming overhead, her primary concern is the interruption of her broadcast of the sitcom "Laverne and Shirley". This scenario presents a surreal contrast between an apocalyptic-scale event and a domestic, trivial frustration. It underscores the absurdity of prioritizing minor inconveniences over global crises.
caption: Yeah, Sylvia—my set too. ... And in the middle of Laverne and Shirley.

other_text.location: bottom right corner of the image
